labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The numbers don't show up and some strange folk are asking you, Mason, what the numbers mean
data.expected_result: The numbers you try to enter show up
data.short_description: You can't use the numpad keys to enter the verification code for phone number
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server with enhanced tableflip enabled - Go through the phone number verification process until you need to enter the verification code - Try to enter the code with numpad keys
